title: UEFA Champions League

creator: UEFA
descriptionHtml:
Get unrivalled coverage of Europe's ultimate club competition. The official UEFA Champions League app brings you the latest news, live coverage, next-day highlights and much more.

FOLLOW THE UEFA CHAMPIONS LEAGUE

- Access all the fixtures and up-to-date standings.
- Read the latest news and analysis from UEFA experts.
- Dive straight into the news that matters to you with our personalised newsfeed.
- Don’t miss a single goal thanks to next-day highlights for every match.
- Listen to live match commentary on the go.
- Get live match statistics for every game.
- Watch all the live draws.
- Get a heads up for all kick-offs, confirmed line-ups and draws.
- Keep up to speed on each team thanks to in-depth form guides.
- Have your say by voting for your Player and Goal of the Week after each matchday.

EXPLORE THE ARCHIVES

- Access all-time player statistics: everything from the top goalscorer to the most yellow cards.
- Access all-time club statistics: everything from the most titles to the most goals conceded.
- Browse comprehensive reviews of each season.
- Watch match highlights from past seasons.
- Watch highlight compilations curated by UEFA experts.

Want to hear about exclusive UEFA competitions, watch classic clips and more?

- Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/championsleague
- Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/championsleague
- Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/championsleague

Download the app for free now to get the definitive UEFA Champions League coverage, straight from the home of European football.

In the latest version of the app, you can get mini-cards in your home feed. Mini-cards give you quicker access to your team’s line-ups, stats, news, form guides, head-to-head records and highlights.

Update your app today to get the best possible Champions League experience.

Get unrivalled coverage of Europe's ultimate club competition. The official UEFA Champions League app brings you the latest news, live coverage, next-day highlights and much more.

FOLLOW THE UEFA CHAMPIONS LEAGUE

- Access all the fixtures and up-to-date standings.
- Read the latest news and analysis from UEFA experts.
- Dive straight into the news that matters to you with our personalised newsfeed.
- Don’t miss a single goal thanks to next-day highlights for every match.
- Listen to live match commentary on the go.
- Get live match statistics for every game.
- Watch all the live draws.
- Get a heads up for all kick-offs, confirmed line-ups and draws.
- Keep up to speed on each team thanks to in-depth form guides.
- Have your say by voting for your Player and Goal of the Week after each matchday.

EXPLORE THE ARCHIVES

- Access all-time player statistics: everything from the top goalscorer to the most yellow cards.
- Access all-time club statistics: everything from the most titles to the most goals conceded.
- Browse comprehensive reviews of each season.
- Watch match highlights from past seasons.
- Watch highlight compilations curated by UEFA experts.

Want to hear about exclusive UEFA competitions, watch classic clips and more?

- Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/championsleague
- Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/championsleague
- Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/championsleague

Download the app for free now to get the definitive UEFA Champions League coverage, straight from the home of European football.
descriptionShort: The official UEFA Champions League app: live scores, stats & news

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
As the UEFA Champions League reaches its climax, follow all the action with the official Champions League app.

In this version, you’ll find new in-depth stats for each team. You can now see who’s scored the most goals in each squad, as well as a detailed breakdown of key stats such as goals, attempts and passes.

Update your app today to get the best Champions League experience.

title: UEFA Champions League football: live scores & news

creator: UEFA
descriptionHtml:
Get unrivalled coverage of Europe's ultimate club football competition. The official UEFA Champions League app brings you the latest soccer news, scores, draws, live coverage, next-day video highlights and our free Fantasy Football game.

FOLLOW THE UEFA CHAMPIONS LEAGUE

- Access all the UCL fixtures, results and up-to-date standings.
- Read the latest Champions League news and analysis from UEFA soccer experts.
- Dive straight into the news that matters to you with our personalised newsfeed.
- Don’t miss a single UCL goal thanks to free next-day* video highlights for every match.
- Listen to live match commentary on the go.
- Get live match statistics and scores for every game.
- Watch all the live draws.
- Get a heads up for all kick-offs, confirmed line-ups, draws and results.
- Keep up to speed on each club thanks to in-depth form guides about the top teams in the Premier League, La Liga, Serie A and the Bundesliga.
- Have your say by voting for your Player and Goal of the Week after each matchday.

EXPLORE THE ARCHIVES

- Access all-time player statistics: everything from the top goalscorer to the most yellow cards.
- Access all-time club statistics and results: everything from the most titles to the most goals conceded.
- Browse stats and videos from past winners such as Real Madrid, Liverpool, Barcelona, Ajax, AC Milan, Manchester United, Juventus, Bayern Munich, Chelsea and more.
- Watch match highlights from past seasons.
- Watch highlight compilations curated by UEFA experts.

PLAY FANTASY FOOTBALL

- Play our free Fantasy game and pick your UCL dream team from Europe’s best soccer stars, including players from La Liga, the Premier League, Serie A and the Bundesliga.
- Spend your €100m budget wisely and score points based on your players’ real-life performances.
- Compete against your friends by creating and joining leagues.
- Check player stats to make the best selection decisions.
- Join leagues with other supporters from your club. If you’re a Real Madrid fan, compete against other Real Madrid fans. If you’re a Juventus fan, battle against other Juventus fans on the Juve fans’ leaderboard.
- Play Fantasy Football and live UEFA Champions League nights in a whole new way!

*Highlights available from midnight CET, except Germany, Austria and Italy, where you can watch video highlights from 00:01 CET on Friday


Want to stay connected to all things Champions League?
Download the app for free now to get the definitive UEFA Champions League coverage, straight from the home of European football.

Fantasy Football is back – pick your squad from Europe's finest, score points throughout the season, climb the leaderboards and take on your friends.

Update your app today to be ready to kick off another season of footballing drama on the biggest stage!

title: Champions League: news & Fantasy Football

creator: UEFA
descriptionHtml:
Get unrivalled coverage of Europe's ultimate club football competition. The official UEFA Champions League app brings you the latest soccer news, scores, draws, live coverage, next-day video highlights and our free Fantasy Football game.

FOLLOW THE UEFA CHAMPIONS LEAGUE

- Get live minute-by-minute updates from every single match.
- Don’t miss a single goal thanks to real-time push notifications.
- Listen to live match commentary on the go.
- Review the goals in detail with next-day highlights for every match*.
- Get live match statistics for every game.
- Access all the fixtures and up-to-date standings.
- Read the latest football news and analysis from UEFA experts.
- Dive straight into the news that matters to you with our personalised home feed.
- Watch the live draws.
- Get a heads up with notifications for all kick-offs, confirmed line-ups and draws.
- Keep up to speed on each club thanks to in-depth form guides about the top teams in the Premier League, La Liga, Serie A and the Bundesliga.
- Analyse individual team pages, squads and player pages
- Have your say by voting for your Player and Goal of the Week after each matchday.

EXPLORE THE ARCHIVES

- Access all-time player statistics: everything from the top goalscorer to the most yellow cards.
- Access all-time club statistics and results: everything from the most titles to the most goals conceded.
- Browse stats and videos from past winners such as Real Madrid, Liverpool, Barcelona, Ajax, AC Milan, Manchester United, Juventus, Bayern Munich, Chelsea and more.
- Watch match highlights from past seasons.
- Watch highlight compilations curated by UEFA experts.

PLAY FANTASY FOOTBALL

- Play our free Fantasy game and pick your UCL dream team from Europe’s best soccer stars, including players from La Liga, the Premier League, Serie A and the Bundesliga.
- Spend your €100m budget wisely and score points based on your players’ real-life performances.
- Compete against your friends by creating and joining leagues.
- Check player stats to make the best selection decisions.
- Join leagues with other supporters from your club. If you’re a Real Madrid fan, compete against other Real Madrid fans. If you’re a Juventus fan, battle against other Juventus fans on the Juve fans’ leaderboard.
- Play Fantasy Football and live UEFA Champions League nights in a whole new way!

*Highlights available from midnight CET, except Germany, Austria and Italy, where you can watch video highlights from 00:01 CET on Friday

Want to stay connected to all things Champions League?
Download the app for free now to get the definitive UEFA Champions League coverage, straight from the home of European football.

Get unrivalled coverage of Europe's ultimate club football competition. The official UEFA Champions League app brings you the latest soccer news, scores, draws, live coverage, next-day video highlights and our free Fantasy Football game.

FOLLOW THE UEFA CHAMPIONS LEAGUE

- Get live minute-by-minute updates from every single match.
- Don’t miss a single goal thanks to real-time push notifications.
- Listen to live match commentary on the go.
- Review the goals in detail with next-day highlights for every match*.
- Get live match statistics for every game.
- Access all the fixtures and up-to-date standings.
- Read the latest football news and analysis from UEFA experts.
- Dive straight into the news that matters to you with our personalised home feed.
- Watch the live draws.
- Get a heads up with notifications for all kick-offs, confirmed line-ups and draws.
- Keep up to speed on each club thanks to in-depth form guides about the top teams in the Premier League, La Liga, Serie A and the Bundesliga.
- Analyse individual team pages, squads and player pages
- Have your say by voting for your Player and Goal of the Week after each matchday.

EXPLORE THE ARCHIVES

- Access all-time player statistics: everything from the top goalscorer to the most yellow cards.
- Access all-time club statistics and results: everything from the most titles to the most goals conceded.
- Browse stats and videos from past winners such as Real Madrid, Liverpool, Barcelona, Ajax, AC Milan, Manchester United, Juventus, Bayern Munich, Chelsea and more.
- Watch match highlights from past seasons.
- Watch highlight compilations curated by UEFA experts.

PLAY FANTASY FOOTBALL

- Play our free Fantasy game and pick your UCL dream team from Europe’s best soccer stars, including players from La Liga, the Premier League, Serie A and the Bundesliga.
- Spend your €100m budget wisely and score points based on your players’ real-life performances.
- Compete against your friends by creating and joining leagues.
- Check player stats to make the best selection decisions.
- Join leagues with other supporters from your club. If you’re a Real Madrid fan, compete against other Real Madrid fans. If you’re a Juventus fan, battle against other Juventus fans on the Juve fans’ leaderboard.
- Play Fantasy Football and live UEFA Champions League nights in a whole new way!

*Highlights available from midnight CET, except Germany, Austria and Italy, where you can watch video highlights from 00:01 CET on Friday

Want to stay connected to all things Champions League?
Download the app for free now to get the definitive UEFA Champions League coverage, straight from the home of European football.
descriptionShort: Live soccer scores, news, stats, video & Fantasy Football game

descriptionHtml:
Get unrivalled coverage of Europe's ultimate club football competition. The official UEFA Champions League app brings you the latest soccer news, scores, draws, live coverage, next-day video highlights and our free Fantasy Football game.

FOLLOW THE UEFA CHAMPIONS LEAGUE

- Get live minute-by-minute updates from every single match.
- Don’t miss a single goal thanks to real-time push notifications.
- Listen to live match commentary on the go.
- Review the goals in detail with next-day highlights for every match*.
- Get live match statistics for every game.
- Access all the fixtures and up-to-date standings.
- Read the latest football news and analysis from UEFA experts.
- Dive straight into the news that matters to you with our personalised home feed.
- Watch the live draws.
- Get a heads up with notifications for all kick-offs, confirmed line-ups and draws.
- Keep up to speed on each club thanks to in-depth form guides about the top teams in the Premier League, La Liga, Serie A and the Bundesliga.
- Analyse individual team pages, squads and player pages
- Have your say by voting for your Player and Goal of the Week after each matchday.

EXPLORE THE ARCHIVES

- Access all-time player statistics: everything from the top goalscorer to the most yellow cards.
- Access all-time club statistics and results: everything from the most titles to the most goals conceded.
- Browse stats and videos from past winners such as Real Madrid, Liverpool, Barcelona, Ajax, AC Milan, Manchester United, Juventus, Bayern Munich, Chelsea and more.
- Watch match highlights from past seasons.
- Watch highlight compilations curated by UEFA experts.

PLAY FANTASY FOOTBALL

- Play our free Fantasy game and pick your UCL dream team from Europe’s best soccer stars, including players from La Liga, the Premier League, Serie A and the Bundesliga.
- Spend your €100m budget wisely and score points based on your players’ real-life performances.
- Compete against your friends by creating and joining leagues.
- Check player stats to make the best selection decisions.
- Join leagues with other supporters from your club. If you’re a Real Madrid fan, compete against other Real Madrid fans. If you’re a Juventus fan, battle against other Juventus fans on the Juve fans’ leaderboard.
- Play Fantasy Football and live UEFA Champions League nights in a whole new way!

*Highlights available from midnight CET, except Germany, Austria and Italy, where you can watch video highlights from 00:01 CET on Friday

Want to stay connected to all things Champions League?
Download the app for free now to get the definitive UEFA Champions League coverage, straight from the home of European football.
descriptionShort: Live soccer scores, news, stats, video & Fantasy Football game

Update your app today to experience all the drama as the league phase comes to an end!

creator: UEFA
descriptionHtml:
Get unrivalled coverage of Europe's ultimate club football competition. The official UEFA Champions League app brings you the latest soccer news, scores, draws, live coverage, next-day video highlights and our free Fantasy Football game.

FOLLOW THE UEFA CHAMPIONS LEAGUE

- Get a heads up with notifications for all kick-offs, confirmed line-ups and draws.

- Analyse individual team pages, squads and player pages
- Have your say by voting for your Player and Goal of the Week after each matchday.

EXPLORE THE ARCHIVES

- Access all-time player statistics: everything from the top goalscorer to the most yellow cards.
- Access all-time club statistics and results: everything from the most titles to the most goals conceded.
- Browse stats and videos from past winners such as Real Madrid, Liverpool, Barcelona, Ajax, AC Milan, Manchester United, Juventus, Bayern Munich, Chelsea and more.
- Watch match highlights from past seasons.

- Join leagues with other supporters from your club. If you’re a Real Madrid fan, compete against other Real Madrid fans. If you’re a Juventus fan, battle against other Juventus fans on the Juve fans’ leaderboard.
